title: Announcement Packs??
body: Was thinking it would be cool maybe having announcement packs implemented into the game for like 520rp... It will mix things up and change the announcers voice for E.g The nee pirate announcer in this new patch :D just an idea i had.. Would be cool hearing blitzcrank saying "PENTA KILL!"

replies.body: Yeah they should at least support it. It should be free.
